result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael L Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael L Johnson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael L Johnson was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $200 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted. $67 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael L Johnson

records.addlTxt: Notice of intent to certify debt to the WI department of revenue returned undeliverable; unable to forward

of representation filed by Atty Paul Frecrickson
Notice of right to seek postconviction relief
Copy of PLEAS minutes emailed to DCJ

*IN CUSTODY*
Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Paul M Fredrickson.  Patrick Winter appeared for the State of Wisconsin. JT: plea ct 2. DISM ct 1 (felony). 20 days DCJ. Argument. Statement by DE. DNA on file. 

  Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count(s) 2.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #  1 . 

  Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT # 2
The Court sentences Defendant to:
-Serve 20 days  in Dane County Jail, with Huber; TIME SERVED 

-Days credit for time served: 16 (3/16/22 - 3/30/22)
-Days credit to jail: 16

COURT COSTS:
Ct # 2
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days. Payment plan approved

-DNA on file

-Defendant advised of post-conviction rights

Becky K
